Although CEOs often are not the most tech-savvy people in their organizations, Jeffrey Zients said that participants in today's conference come from companies that are leaders in innovation and using technology. We've picked the right CEOs, he said. Donald Rumsfeld , who served as President Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that ''in a war, many things cost lives.''

for the financial assistance that was critical to the recovery of our Group,'' he said. Sergio Marchionne noted that no one else but the Canadian and U.S. governments were willing to help Chrysler. As the only parties willing to underwrite the risk associated with Chrysler's recovery plan, the two governments levied interest rates that, although appropriate at the time, are above current market conditions. This was done with the full support and understanding of the members of Chrysler Group LLC. Chrysler is seeking$ 3 billion in low-cost government loans from the Energy Department to build more fuel efficient vehicles and in talks with banks to refinance the company's debt. Oprah Winfrey narrates a biography-and-interview show about stars- Condoleezza Rice , Maya Angelou , Simon Cowell - who embody qualities she admires. When Oprah Winfrey talks about, say, Jay-Z, it sounds as if she is also talking about herself: If you don't know who you are before fame hits, you will definitely end up losing yourself in all the opinions around you.( See the top 10 Oprah Winfrey controversies.)
